mapper.select: select count(*) from MEMBER where user_id =#{id} and user_pw = #{pw}
select count(*) from MEMBER where user_id=#{id} and email_check='1'
select user_id from MEMBER where email=#{email} and user_name=#{name}
select user_pw from MEMBER where user_name=#{name} and user_id=#{id} and email=#{email} and phone=#{phone}
select count(*) from MEMBER where user_id=#{id}
select count(*) from MEMBER where email=#{email}
mapper.update: update MEMBER set email_check=#{auth} where email=#{email}
update MEMBER set user_name=#{user_name}, user_pw=#{user_pw}, phone=#{phone} where user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.select: select HISTORIC_SITE.bno, HISTORIC_SITE.site_name, HISTORIC_SITE_REPLY.reply_text, HISTORIC_SITE_REPLY.update_date from HISTORIC_SITE_REPLY, HISTORIC_SITE where HISTORIC_SITE.bno=HISTORIC_SITE_REPLY.bno and HISTORIC_SITE_REPLY.replyer=#{user_id}
select count(rno) from HISTORIC_SITE_REPLY where replyer=#{user_id}
select count(*) from MEMBER_SITE where bno=#{bno} and user_id=${user_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER_SITE ( USER_ID, BNO, FIRST_IMAGE, SITE_NAME, ADDRESS, PERIOD, THEMA ) VALUES ( ${user_id}, ${bno}, (SELECT HISTORIC_SITE.FIRST_IMAGE FROM HISTORIC_SITE WHERE HISTORIC_SITE.BNO=${bno}), (SELECT HISTORIC_SITE.SITE_NAME FROM HISTORIC_SITE WHERE HISTORIC_SITE.BNO=${bno}), (SELECT HISTORIC_SITE.ADDRESS FROM HISTORIC_SITE WHERE HISTORIC_SITE.BNO=${bno}), (SELECT HISTORIC_SITE.PERIOD FROM HISTORIC_SITE WHERE HISTORIC_SITE.BNO=${bno}), (SELECT HISTORIC_SITE.THEMA FROM HISTORIC_SITE WHERE HISTORIC_SITE.BNO=${bno}) );
